reviewText:
From the back cover:

Celebrate 12 new ways to enjoy each and every day of the year with this celebration of Britain's hottest women!

Featuring:
Joanne Guest
Kirsten Imrie
Adele Stevens
Charmaine Sinclair
Teresa May
Jordan
Lisa Montgomery
Sammi Jessop
Lana Cox
Mischa
Linzi Dawn McKenzie
Vickey Lee

60 minutes, very sexy girls in bathing suits and other sexy clothes

It is definitely worth paying $10.00 for.  Jo Guest is pretty hot in this thing as well.  But all of the other girls contained in here are pretty much worth fast-forwarding through . .Then again, it is only an opinion and others might have different tastes than mine.  As a result, just giving my input strictly on the Kirsten Imrie and Jo Guest part of the DVD, and if you're a fan of any of the others, might be worth buying.  All I know is that these two ladies were nicely done.
